post.body: You aren't twittering much!!
We are all one big DISFUNCTIONAL family and we have to learn to get along. Reconciliation is a must. Rick Warren? Let's see....
In attic, rain pattering on roof, I snuggle deeply into blankets as the world spins closer to Christmas. G'night.
Some family time, some wine, some words of wisdom -- cold Ohio weather, but warming. Holiday happiness to one and all. Peace hugs!
Still in Cleveland, doing family stuff -- a few cards to be sent late. There are 12 Days of Christmas and I need every one :-) Peace hugs!
I'm in Mayfield Hts. Take your mother to work day?
Downtown Cleveland! Where is LK? When are we seeing Audient and Gina?
Past accident at 6:58 AM - 22 miles to Cleveland.
Flashing lights ahead. Traffic crawling.
At 6:23 AM 52 miles to Cleveland.
Near Youngstown. 61 miles to Cleveland. 6:12 AM.
Halfway to Cleveland.
Heading off to see my daughter Kat and son M. Dylan, and DD-in-law Gina. Peace hugs!
Cleveland-bound yet I am busy at the computer while way too much holiday stuff beckons. Who said, "First things first"? Peace hugs!
Huzzah! Tree decorated! http://qtakes.blogspot.com/ Peace hugs!
Drinking coffee and noting New School students' successful protest and Franken's being ahead in Minn. senate recount.
Up and at 'em. What to do first? Feed Wilbur and Boots. Peace hugs!!
The tree is 3/4 decorated -- it's beginning to look a lot like Christmas.
Supported Thom Hartmann's positive viewpoint on Rick Warren choice - http://tinyurl.com/4gy5jz
Screwed up my updates and reposting -- I've put the lights on the tree while listening to Thom Hartmann on AirAmerica.com.
